channel.title: A Question on Emulation of sorts
channel.description: okay soo im downloading a game for ps2 im curious how it will run on my computer do i need some sort of program to run it> if soo what would it be[br][size=1]Posted at: December 12, 2006, 09:57:01 PM[/size][hr]nvm tis impossible

item.title: A Question on Emulation of sorts
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

You would need a PS2 emulator… I know there is something called PSX, but I believe thats for PS1 games only. Try a Google search for PS2 emulators… Hope I helped :o

Read full topic
